name: Garlic Bread
description: It goes with everything. (Yes, everything.) It can satisfy even the pickiest of eaters. It’s a scene-stealing side. It’s—you guessed it—garlic bread.

Make your life a little easier with our super easy, super delicious garlic bread recipe. We’re giving this recipe bonus points for how easy it is to make. The garlic bread’s two-minute prep time wins over every cook, every time.
recipeDirectionsSteps: Mix 4 Tbsp. melted butter and 2 cloves grated garlic in a bowl.
Cut 1 French bread loaf in half lengthwise, and brush with butter-garlic mixture.
Bake at 350˚F for 15 minutes. Top with Parmesan and chopped fresh parsley.
